name(Fleeing the Yakuza)

snap(-40,-40,-40)
sky(0,0,0)
fog(254,115,115)
ground(10,80,10)
polys(10,120,10)
fadefrom(5000)
density(5)
nlaps(1)
lightson()


set(47,0,0,0)p
set(10,0,5600,0)
chk(40,0,8400,0)
set(10,0,11200,0)p
set(14,0,15750,-90)
